website_summaries.verdict: A sizable adult bib with extended coverage that's ideal for larger frames. A wider-than-average neck opening delivers improved wearer comfort.
pros: Velcro fastener is positioned on the side for easy access
Soft, durable poly-cotton outer with a waterproof lining
cons: Large size seems to lessen the crumb catcher's efficacy

customer_reviews.title: Great adult bib
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a different brand previously, but this brand in far better. It fits a 6 foot tall man with a large neck. Wish I had bought this brand before I have now ordered another one because we liked the first one so much.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Good Product...it serves it purpose.
customer_reviews.text: These adult bibs are great for my dad. He is 90 years old and this bibs help him from getting his shirts and pants dirty. It is doing what is suppose to do. It is serving its purpose. I have not washed them yet since I just got them. It they are good still after wash...great. If not I will post again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay N.

customer_reviews.title: Large Quality Bib
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality bib. Large enough to cover the entire torso and top of the pants. The opening at the top is very large, a bit too large for my dad in fact but you can always pull it back so the slack is at the back and it can cover the front side completely. We only have it for about a week and we haven't had a need to wash it yet. I'll update when there are any trouble in that department.
customer_reviews.author: Hadi S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, well-constructed cover. There's ample velcro so it won't wear out so fast as I've found in others. The material is good, doesn't crack or peel after washing. I like the tray at the bottom that catches any food particles. I'm buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Penny W.

customer_reviews.title: fits as adverrised
customer_reviews.text: Wide and long as advertised, easily fits my 6’4, 315 pound father. Washes well, good durability. wipes off easily. I keep rebuying because the nursing facility loses them!

customer_reviews.title: Large, durable, absorbent bib. AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This by far outranks all other bibs for senior adults or for anyone. My husband is a large man with a thick neck and it goes around with plenty of room. It's extra wide so it catches everything . I love the way it catches the crumbs from his Danish. They're not on the floor anymore.😜

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are great bibs! I have ordered before. This time I ordered the X Large and they are WAY easier for me to put on my big guy. product_meta.title: Modaliv Adult Bib - Extra Large Reusable Clothing Protector - Waterproof - Crumb Catcher - Machine Washable (XL Blue)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueEnjoy Mealtimes Again with the Extra Large Modaliv Adult Bib for Men and Women!

This extra wide bib with an adjustable hook and loop fastener will fit larger men and women (up to 26 ½” neck size). The fastening on the shoulder makes life easier for people with limited mobility.

The soft poly/cotton blend gives you a comfortable wearing experience, without sacrificing long-lasting durability.

Increased Confidence

This subtle design for men and women doesn’t look like a “typical bib” and helps to hide stains, increasing confidence during mealtimes.

Stay Clean & Dry

Covering your torso and lap, this extra large bib gives you the best coverage against spills.

The outer poly/cotton blend protects clothing from stains and is very easy to wipe clean. Whilst the waterproof lining stops spills soaking through.

Your clothes will be kept stain-free, stopping you or your loved one from feeling insecure during/after mealtimes.

Please note the bib may lose some absorption power if subjected to large amounts of liquid.

Bib measures 34 ½” (length) & 23 ½” (width)

Reduce Cleaning Time

Split food is safely collected in the crumb catcher, keeping everything neat and tidy.

Machine Wash & Dry

The colors won’t run or bleed in the wash, so just fully fasten the neck closure, pop it in a wash cold with the rest of your items and tumble dry low. Note the colors may fade after the first wash.

Don’t waste money on disposable bibs. You can reuse this bib over and over again.

Made from 65% Polyester, 35% Cotton, Waterproof Lined Fleece Backing.

100% Satisfaction Guarantee

If for any reason you’re not 100% happy with your Modaliv Adult Bib, we’ll refund or replace your purchase - HASSLE FREE, no questions asked.

Simply Go to the Top of the Page and Hit the "ADD TO CART" Button to Order Your Modaliv Adult Bib TODAY!
feature_bullets: EXTRA WIDE COVERAGE AND LARGER NECK OPENING FOR GREATER COMFORT - Extra wide bib (23 ½” width) provides more protection than standard sized bibs. The adjustable hook and loop closure fits larger females and males (up to 26 ½” neck size). You or your loved one will dine in complete comfort.

EASY TO FIT - You'll never struggle with a behind-the-neck closure again. The Modaliv bib for eating features a shoulder hook and loop closure, allowing easier access for people with limited mobility.
FEEL CONFIDENT - This subtle design for men and women doesn’t look like your “typical bib” and helps to hide stains, increasing confidence during mealtimes.

STAY CLEAN & REDUCE CLEANING TIME - The extra large bib (34 ½” length x 23 ½” width), gives your torso and lap complete coverage and is super easy to wipe down. The built-in crumb catcher stops food and spills reaching the floor, making cleaning hassle-free.
REUSABLE, MACHINE WASH & DRY - You’ll be able to wash and reuse this bib over and over again, no more wasting money on ill-fitting disposable bibs. (See description for washing instructions).
